================================================================================

Compound #1
Source: sa_pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā1-8.json
Input: ghrāṇagandhaghrāṇavijñānasaṃsparśapratyayād
----------------------------------------
Found 5 roots:
Found 5 groups:
  gandhaghrāṇa, ghrāṇa, pratyaya, saṃsparśa, vijñāna

Analysis by found words:
--------------------
• Found form [gandhaghrāṇa]:
    - gandhaghrāṇa

• Found form [ghrāṇa]:
    - ghrāṇa

• Found form [pratyayāt]:
    - pratyaya

• Found form [saṃsparśa]:
    - saṃsparśa

• Found form [vijñāna]:
    - vijñāna
